reviewText: Love the anime and the movie, just wanting for part 2 to get here so I can watch.

Great acting by Yamada Ryosuke and loved Koro Sensei
Very good graphics and just the right amount of humor and action mixed together.
Very quick shipping, got here a week before the estimated time. Plays great and is a very enjoyable movie!

Loved this live action version of the show. Think of it as an abbreviated version of the show. Some events are moved around and done a little differently. It's not easy taking 26 episodes and making it into a 2 hour movie. The subtitles are perfect, I did notice one word was off. Only one. So if you're a fan of the show you'll love this movie. It's just a lot of fun.
